post: Was watching Barry Schwortz on EWTN earlier this year..funny how he seemed to dismiss the Tilma..based on some secondhand comments he had heard……… I smiled and thought he was possibly making the same rush to judgment that others have made on his beloved shroud thanks for the link Louis.
